content.webTitle: Tropical cyclones Marcia and Lam: your photos and experiences

fields.headline: Tropical cyclones Marcia and Lam: your photos and experiences
fields.bodyText: As severe tropical cyclone Marcia lashes the east coast of Australia with winds up to 295km/h, and tropical cyclone Lam hits the Northern Territory, we’re covering developments live, including photos and videos from across the internet. Whether you’re on the beaches at the Gold Coast, in the eye of the storm at Yeppoon or cleaning up in the Northern Territory, we’d love to see and share your stories with Australia. Share your personal experiences of the leadup, aftermath and cleanup from the wild weather, using pictures or video, and remember to stay safe at all times. We will publish the best content on the Guardian site. Share your photos, videos and experiences by clicking on the blue ‘Contribute’ buttons. Or if you’re out and about you can download the GuardianWitness app or look for our assignments in the new Guardian app where you can keep up with all our assignments. GuardianWitness is the home of content created by Guardian readers. Share your video, pictures and stories, and browse contributions submitted by others. Posts will be reviewed prior to publication on GuardianWitness, and the best pieces will feature on the Guardian site.
